UniprotID	Q9HC24
Accession	Q9HC24;Q542Z6;Q9UHY5;Q9Y3C2
EntryName	LFG4_HUMAN
ProteinName	Protein lifeguard 4 (Golgi anti-apoptotic protein) (Protein S1R) (Transmembrane BAX inhibitor motif-containing protein 4) (Z-protein)
GeneName	TMBIM4 GAAP LFG4 CGI-119
Length	238
Function	Anti-apoptotic protein which can inhibit apoptosis induced by intrinsic and extrinsic apoptotic stimuli. Can modulate both capacitative Ca2+ entry and inositol 1,4,5-trisphosphate (IP3)-mediated Ca2+ release.
Subcellular Location	Golgi apparatus membrane
